Name: Aero Battle
About the game: Aero Battle - indie simulator of air battles, executed in 2D hand-drawn graphics. In the game, you need to control an aircraft and defeat enemy fighters, which over time will become stronger and increase in numbers, so you should always be on your guard. To simplify your task, you can pick up one of these boosters: Also, earn coins to buy cooler planes. Good luck in battle!
